content:
Several runs are (seemingly intermittently) failing, e.g.:

  • #866
  • #871

As you can see, the actual build worked just fine. I don't even know what the 'project API docs' are... Can someone shed some light on this?
Project api docs refer to the pages like carleson#TileStructure and such (hoping the linkifier works here)
These documentation pages need to be generated from the lean files and put on the GitHub pages site
Pietro Monticone has marked this topic as resolved.

We got the same error in #278.
Can we make this step more robust? What is the solution if this happens? Clear the cache and rerun the job? Is this step actually testing something useful for PRs that only touch Lean files?
Apparently just rerunning the job fixed it...
Yes, rerunning the job should suffice in this case.
